Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Fortunately \For"tu*nate*ly\, adv. In a fortunate manner; luckily; successfully; happily. [1913 Webster]
fortunately adv : by good fortune; "fortunately the weather was good" [syn: {fortuitously}, {luckily}, {as luck would have it}] [ant: {unfortunately}, {unfortunately}]
